data.name: Star Renegades: Guardian of the Metaverse
data.detailed_description:
New Hero: The Guardian

The ultimate damage soaking-tank with an ability to bend reality.

New Rebel Base Building: The Metaverse Relationship Tracker

We've heard your requests! With this new building, you can survey all your heroes' unlocked relationships across all realities and replay key moments in their bonding.
data.about_the_game:
New Hero: The Guardian

The ultimate damage soaking-tank with an ability to bend reality.

New Rebel Base Building: The Metaverse Relationship Tracker

We've heard your requests! With this new building, you can survey all your heroes' unlocked relationships across all realities and replay key moments in their bonding.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-3220T @ 2.80GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 820 @ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750(2GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon™ Pro 460 (2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600K @ 3.5GHz / AMD Ryzen™ 3 2200G @ 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960(4GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon™ Pro 570 (4GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
